Other Information.Additional Info: Hydrated lithium ion can remove water molecules more easily to enter the ZIF-8 channel.

Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Steric effect due to size exclusion

Other Information.Additional Info: The pore window of ZIF-8 is smaller than the hydrated magnesium ion, inhibiting its transport.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale combined with partial dehydration effects

Experimental Validation.Method: Current-voltage (I–V) measurement in a two-compartment transport cell

Other Information.Additional Info: The ZIF-8 channels are the dominant pathways for ion transport, and the epoxy matrix fills intercrystalline defects.
